com.github.pavelt.appsistedparking.database

Class CassandraClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pavelt.appsistedparking.database.CassandraClient

  • public class CassandraClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Class enforced as a singleton. This is to allow the cassandra client to maintain its own connection-pool.

        Returns:

      • shutDownClient

        public void shutDownClient()
        Used for shutting down the client. The client runs on a thread that will never stop, unless explicitly told to.
